channel.title: [z508] In what file are wilderness/PvP zones defined?
channel.description:
The topic is extremely self-explanatory.
I just shifted from coding 317s to 508s, and I can't find the java file which defines what locations are wilderness and which aren't.
I'm using a fairly standard z508 base.
Thanks,
David
[note: I am not Davidi2]

item.title: [z508] In what file are wilderness/PvP zones defined?
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Look for wildernessZone in the Player class.

Read full topic
item.source: [z508] In what file are wilderness/PvP zones defined?
